Text: TradersNews Energy new price reporting sheet Cc PST Greetings to all Enron hourly traders TradersNews Energy would like to provide you with a new form for you to use to input your hourly trade information including off peak hourly Please include your actual physical hourly trades in the attached template along with any bidask indicative spreads for those hours where no actual trades exist Don Baughman has authorized the distribution of your actual hourly trade information to TradersNews Energy As a follow up our over night price reporters will touch base with you and answer any questions you may have OVER NIGHT CONTACT INFORMATION AJ Alexander Sara Jawaid Thanks for your help and participation Gene Simpson Director Source Development office hub templatexls
